net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade.security.user

Class UserManagerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade.security.user.UserManagerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security.user.UserManager

    public class UserManagerFacade
extends Object
implements org.apache.jackrabbit.api.security.user.UserManager
    Wraps UserManager to prevent authorizable modifications and to wrap retrieved Authorizable, User, and Group instances.

    • Field Summary
